short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost sales, product, & customer insights with the TranscribeIQ Extension: AI Transcript integration, & custom call summaries.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform Your Conversations into Actionable Intelligence
Boost sales, product, and customer insights with TranscribeIQ. Our Chrome extension integrates with Gong and supports major platforms that generate transcripts, delivering unparalleled insights from your calls.

Key Features:
-Advanced AI Analytics: Uncover hidden opportunities using custom-trained AI models
-Multi-Call Analysis: Perform account-level analysis across multiple calls instantly
-Gong Integration & Multi-Platform Support: Analyze Gong calls or import transcripts from Zoom, Google Meet, MS Teams, and more
-Custom Call Summaries: Generate tailored insights for various teams 
-Sentiment Analysis: Understand conversation tone to improve customer interactions
-Personalized Coaching: Receive instant feedback to enhance team performance Custom Prompts: Ask your transcripts anything with our flexible query system

How TranscribeIQ Empowers Your Teams:

For Sales Teams:
-Deal Progression Analysis
-BANT, MEDDPICC, and More
-Deal Audits
-Objection Handling Insights
-Competitive Intelligence

For Customer Success Teams:
-QBR/Renewal Reviews
-New Customer Handoff Docs
-Success Plan Development
-Sentiment Tracking
-Training Prep

For Product Teams:
-Feature Request Tracking
-User Pain Point Analysis
-Competitive Product Comparisons
-Beta Feedback Analysis
-User Experience Insights

Specialized Analyses:
-Account Health Reviews
-Training and Onboarding
-ROI Measurement

Why Choose TranscribeIQ?
-Time Savings: Reduce manual review time by up to 80%
-Enhanced Insights: Make data-driven decisions
-Increased Productivity: Focus on high-value activities
-Seamless Integration: Works with your existing tools
-Continuous Improvement: Regular updates and new AI capabilities

Perfect for:
-Sales Reps, AE's, BDRs, and Managers
-CSMs, AMs, and Directors  of CS
-Product Managers and UX Designers
-Training and Enablement Teams
-C-Suite Executives seeking data-driven insights

Start your 14-day free trial today and revolutionize your approach to conversation analysis. Install TranscribeIQ now and empower your entire organization with AI-driven insights that drive tangible results across sales, customer success, and product development.Transform Your Conversations into Actionable Intelligence
